Product title: Taozun Shower Caddy Organizer Tension Pole, Rustproof 2 Towel Bars and 4 Adjustable Shelves, 25-114.2 Inch No-Drill Quick Installation, Extra Soap Dish for Bathroom Storage Black
Key Features: Dual Towel Bars & Smart Hooks — Keep towels dry and all shower essentials—like loofahs, washcloths, and squeegees—right within reach. No more clutter, just a clean, organized shower space. | Built-In Storage for Bath Essentials — Equipped with dedicated soap dishes, razor slots, and extra hooks for sponges or small tools. Everything stays neatly in place and ready to use. | Fully Adjustable & No Drilling Needed — Easily customize the pole length (25″–114″) to fit any shower or bathtub corner. Ideal for renters and any bathroom layout. | Quick-Drain Design & Upside-Down Bottle Slots — Open shelves prevent water buildup while inverted slots let you store shampoo bottles upside down—so every drop gets used. | High Fence & Large Capacity — Features raised edges to prevent bottles from tipping. Easily holds all your shampoo, conditioner, soap, and other shower necessities.
comment 2: Just installed, so haven’t really used. So far we are pleased with it. I DO suggest following the YouTube video for assistance in putting together and installing as the enclosed directions are hard to read. I also suggest putting the 2 “arms” for hanging lower than suggested. You really need to play with it before installing so it’s according to your liking. - Deby L Bretz
comment 4: Great product.  Looks great in the shower and easy clean. - Jennifer B
